001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.CaptureConfig;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.CompositionRoot;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.IoMode;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.logging.Logs;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.logging.LoggingConfigurator;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.validation.Paths;
009import java.io.IOException;
010import java.nio.file.Path;
011import java.util.Map;
012import org.slf4j.Logger;
013import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
014
015/**
016 * Launches the live RADAR capture pipeline from CLI key-value arguments.
017 *
018 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
019 */
020public final class LiveCli {
021  private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(LiveCli.class);
022  private static final String SUMMARY_USAGE =
023      "usage: live iface=<nic> [out=PATH|out=kafka:TOPIC] [ioMode=FILE|KAFKA] "
024          + "[snaplen=64-262144] [bufmb=4-4096] [timeout=0-60000] [--enable-bpf --bpf='expr'] "
025          + "[--dry-run] [--allow-overwrite]";
026  private static final String HELP_TEXT = """
027      RADAR live processing pipeline
028
029      Usage:
030        live iface=<nic> [options]
031
032      Required:
033        iface=NAME                Network interface to capture from
034
035      Optional (validated):
036        out=PATH                  Segment output directory (default ~/.radar/out/capture/segments)
037        out=kafka:TOPIC           Stream segments to Kafka topic (sanitized [A-Za-z0-9._-])
038        ioMode=FILE|KAFKA         FILE writes under ~/.radar/out; KAFKA requires kafkaBootstrap
039        kafkaBootstrap=HOST:PORT  Validated host/port when ioMode=KAFKA
040        snaplen=64-262144         Snap length bytes (default 65535; alias snap=...)
041        bufmb=4-4096              Capture buffer in MiB (default 256)
042        timeout=0-60000           Poll timeout in ms (default 1000)
043        --enable-bpf              Required gate for custom BPF expressions
044        --bpf="expr"               Printable ASCII <=1024 bytes; ';' and '`' rejected
045        --dry-run                 Validate inputs and print plan without processing
046        --allow-overwrite         Permit writing into non-empty output directories
047        --verbose                 Enable DEBUG logging for troubleshooting
048        --help                    Show this message
049      """;
050
051  private LiveCli() {}
052
053  /**
054   * Entry point invoked by the JVM.
055   *
056   * @param args raw CLI arguments
057   */
058  public static void main(String[] args) {
059    ExitCode exit = run(args);
060    System.exit(exit.code());
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Executes the live CLI logic and returns the resulting exit code.
065   *
066   * @param args raw CLI arguments
067   * @return exit code signalling success or failure
068   */
069  static ExitCode run(String[] args) {
070    CliInput input = CliInput.parse(args);
071    if (input.help()) {
072      CliPrinter.println(HELP_TEXT.stripTrailing());
073      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
074    }
075    if (input.verbose()) {
076      LoggingConfigurator.enableVerboseLogging();
077      log.debug("Verbose logging enabled for live CLI");
078    }
079
080    boolean dryRun = input.hasFlag("--dry-run");
081    boolean allowOverwrite = input.hasFlag("--allow-overwrite");
082    boolean enableBpfFlag = input.hasFlag("--enable-bpf");
083
084    Map<String, String> kv;
085    try {
086      kv = CliArgsParser.toMap(input.keyValueArgs());
087    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
088      log.error("Invalid argument: {}", ex.getMessage());
089      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
090      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
091    }
092    if (enableBpfFlag) {
093      kv.put("enableBpf", "true");
094    }
095
096    CaptureConfig captureConfig;
097    try {
098      captureConfig = CaptureConfig.fromMap(kv);
099    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
100      log.error("Invalid live capture configuration: {}", ex.getMessage());
101      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
102      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
103    }
104
105
106    if (captureConfig.pcapFile() != null) {
107      log.error("pcapFile is not supported for live processing; use the capture command instead");
108      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
109      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
110    }
111
112    ValidatedPaths validated;
113    try {
114      validated = validateOutputs(captureConfig, allowOverwrite, !dryRun);
115    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
116      log.error("Invalid output path configuration: {}", ex.getMessage());
117      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
118      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
119    }
120
121    if (dryRun) {
122      printDryRunPlan(captureConfig, validated, allowOverwrite);
123      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
124    }
125
126    if (captureConfig.customBpfEnabled()) {
127      log.warn("SECURITY: Custom BPF expression enabled ({} bytes)", captureConfig.filter().length());
128      log.debug("SECURITY: BPF expression '{}'", Logs.truncate(captureConfig.filter(), 128));
129    }
130
131    CompositionRoot root =
132        new CompositionRoot(ca.gc.cra.radar.config.Config.defaults(), captureConfig);
133
134    try {
135      log.info("Starting live processing on interface {}", captureConfig.iface());
136      root.liveProcessingUseCase().run();
137      log.info("Live processing completed on interface {}", captureConfig.iface());
138      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
139    } catch (IOException ex) {
140      log.error("Live processing I/O failure on interface {}", captureConfig.iface(), ex);
141      return ExitCode.IO_ERROR;
142    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
143      log.error("Live processing configuration error: {}", ex.getMessage(), ex);
144      return ExitCode.CONFIG_ERROR;
145    } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
146      Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
147      log.error("Live processing interrupted; shutting down interface {}", captureConfig.iface(), ex);
148      return ExitCode.INTERRUPTED;
149    } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
150      log.error("Unexpected runtime failure in live processing", ex);
151      return ExitCode.RUNTIME_FAILURE;
152    } catch (Exception ex) {
153      log.error("Unexpected checked exception in live processing", ex);
154      return ExitCode.RUNTIME_FAILURE;
155    }
156  }
157
158  private static ValidatedPaths validateOutputs(
159      CaptureConfig config, boolean allowOverwrite, boolean createIfMissing) {
160    Path segments = config.outputDirectory();
161    if (config.ioMode() == IoMode.FILE) {
162      segments =
163          Paths.validateWritableDir(segments, null, createIfMissing, allowOverwrite);
164    }
165    Path http =
166        Paths.validateWritableDir(config.httpOutputDirectory(), null, createIfMissing, allowOverwrite);
167    Path tn3270 =
168        Paths.validateWritableDir(config.tn3270OutputDirectory(), null, createIfMissing, allowOverwrite);
169    return new ValidatedPaths(segments, http, tn3270);
170  }
171
172  private static void printDryRunPlan(
173      CaptureConfig config, ValidatedPaths paths, boolean allowOverwrite) {
174    CliPrinter.printLines(
175        "Live dry-run: no packets will be processed.",
176        " Interface        : " + config.iface(),
177        " Snaplen          : " + config.snaplen(),
178        " Buffer (bytes)   : " + config.bufferBytes(),
179        " Timeout (ms)     : " + config.timeoutMillis(),
180        " I/O mode         : " + config.ioMode(),
181        " Segments dir     : " + paths.segments(),
182        " HTTP dir         : " + paths.http(),
183        " TN3270 dir       : " + paths.tn3270(),
184        " Kafka bootstrap  : " + (config.kafkaBootstrap() == null ? "<none>" : config.kafkaBootstrap()),
185        " Kafka topic      : " + (config.kafkaTopicSegments() == null ? "<none>" : config.kafkaTopicSegments()),
186        " Allow overwrite  : " + allowOverwrite,
187        " BPF filter       : " + Logs.truncate(config.filter(), 96),
188        " Re-run without --dry-run to start processing.");
189  }
190
191  private record ValidatedPaths(Path segments, Path http, Path tn3270) {}
192}
